Title: Diary of a Maniac
Writer: Liliane Betti (story), Marco Ferreri (screenplay), Liliane Betti (screenplay), Riccardo Ghione (scenario collaborator)
Actors: Jerry Calà, Sabrina Ferilli, Valentino Macchi, Laetitia Laneri
Plot: Although he has great sex with Luigia, grifter Benito becomes obsessed with sex and starts fantasizing about and bedding every woman he sees. Eventually, this obsession consumes him.
